Articles.Content:
So, this is a game where we create the history of the Kerbal civilization. I will start.

Rules are:

  1. Everyone must post in Chronological order (in order of time)
  2. Must not contain obscene content
  3. easter eggs must not be super obvious
  4. must not be longer than 3 sentence per response (DO NOT USE SUPER-DUPER LONG SENTENCES)
  5. the year which kerbals exist is year 100, and now is year 5000.

enjoy!

Year 100: Kerbals exist on the planet kerbin as hunter-gatherers

Edited December 6, 2013 by Goodle...

Year 250: Kerbals discover use of fire. However, as Kerbin was much drier then than now, much of the vegetation burns down, forcing the Kerbals to find new food sources. They discover a kind of goo in caves that can be eaten when cooked.
Year 263: Kerbals invent the wheel.
Year 264: Intrepid Kerbals start experimenting with the new wheel technology. First major breakthrough: Do not get in front of a fast rolling wheel, it hurts.
Year 310: Kerbals discover attaching stone to wood can chip away stone that can be used to build.
Year 311: Kerbals attach wheels to a large stick with a stone on the front, leading to an unfortunate ending when demonstrated going down a hill to the Kerbal village.
Year 350 - Kerbals discover Mystery Goo.
Year 351 gunpowder is invented. The inventor did so by blowing up himself in the experiment.
Year 360 gunpowder is perfected, and a simple "gun" is crafted. They fired it at the ground, and found the kerbal lifted off the ground a meter.
Year 361 gunpowder is discovered to have the ability launch itself into the air when pointed down a tube. The first fireworks are created.
Year 365 The first houses are built. Most houses burnt down due to fireworks display accident. Kerbals achieve civilization.
Year 375 Kerbals develop rocket carts by strapping fireworks to their carts
Year 400: After realizing more gunpowder= more boom, they sucessfully create a "gunpowder rocket" it flew up to 1km, and the strechyness of the kerbal body was discovered.

Year 376: Language, sport and religion are simultaneously invented when {said} rocket cart carries Kerbal into the air after travelling up a very steep slope.

Earliest records the word "fuego", scholars are still mystified about it's meaning...

((Remember Kerbals speak reversed Spanish))

Year 377: First recorded car accident when 2 rocket carts crash into each other. Kerbal blood is discovered to be green when wounds are inspected. a funnel attached to the firework rocket is found to get higher, thus turning into the first SRB. (go tell Jeb's great great great great great great great grandfather. He will be excited. He has the same name so it will be easy to find.

Year 380 first multi staged rocket is built as a mystified Kerbal strapped multiple SRBs on top each other and flew over a hill (this was Bill's ancestor)

Edited December 10, 2013 by Helix935
whoops wrong year
Year 364 First pistol invented when a soldier demanded a gun that can only fires 1 bullet at a time and is smaller. First nation : Kerballia is formed. King Jebidiah is crowned

Year 381

the first glider invented as a kerbal held to a wooden board and was kicked down a cliff and lived by gliding. (Bob's ancestor) The kicker is Kirrim Kerman's ancestor

Year 390

Kerbals take their first look towards the stars and invent catapults to attempt to launch themselves to "the pretty lights"

Year 391

Cake is invented as a substitute for snacks being airdropped to stranded Kerbals. It was also found to cause Kerbals to spontaneously loose consciousness while in proximity of cake. Regardless if their space suit was on or off.

Since my post was seeminhgly forgotten....

Year 400: After realizing more gunpowder= more boom, they sucessfully create a "gunpowder rocket" it flew up to 1km, and the strechyness of the kerbal body was discovered.

Year 401

Electricity is first used for killing as 1 kerbal is struck by lightning

year 402

Electricity is used for peaceful purposes as it is used to power the first light bulb for a second after the deaths of 25 kerbals that tried to attract lightning

Edit: Destroyer, your post wasn't forgotten but i had gone to far ahead at the time
Year 403: A kerbal jumps on top of a firework in order to get "closer to the lightning"
Year 404: History not found.
